text: The Geometry Panda is a electric City car made by Geometry since 2022. it was also badged as "Geome". it was revealed at a shopping mall in Hangzhou in December 2022. == History == The Geometry Panda was spotted for the first time in a series of Photos from the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, it has a design simillar to the Wuiling Hongguang Mini EV. The production version made its debut in February 2023 it has a short range and a long range versions the short range can reach 120 Km (75 Mi), while the long range can reach 200 km (120 Mi) with a speed of 100 km/h (62 Mph). The long range version has 30 KW (40 HP) and it can charge from 30 to 80% in 30 minutes. == Markets == The Geometry Panda currently is sold mainly in the Chinese market. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Geometry Panda
